descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iOS 7, 8 and 9

Cercube 3 is the best all-in-one video download extension for the YouTube app.
This is an extension for the official YouTube app which can be downloaded from the AppStore for free.

The official YouTube app is a great YouTube client but it lacks a several key features that most YouTube users want: Video downloads, customizable playback quality, no ads and much more.

Cercube 3 takes care of the missing features in YouTube app.

It’s build right into the YouTube app and adds these great features to the app:
• Download any video in any available quality. (from 144p to 1080p).
• View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube’s download manager.
• Import downloaded songs and videos to your Music Library, or Videos app.
• Block all promoted cells and video ads.
• Send downloaded videos via AirDrop to other devices.
• Background playback capability for both streamed and downloaded videos.
• Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted downloads manager that shows all the available information.
• Select which page to display when launching the YouTube app.
• Unique short-hold button gestures.
• HD streaming on mobile networks.
• Auto replay videos.

Cercube options are configurable from within the YouTube app settings.

changelog.change: New redesigned player for audio downloads.
